A stunning architecturally designed West Coast home situated on a park like property with total privacy from which to enjoy gorgeous west/southwest ocean views, all day sunshine and evening sunsets over Bowen Island. Live in this immaculately maintained and elegant seaside home, while planning an expansion or your dream home. This is an exceptionally rare oceanfront property to create the ultimate waterfront retreat.  Close to excellent public and private schools, premiere shopping and dining, and downtown Vancouver. Enjoy easy access to world class skiing, golf, parks, seawall walks, all part of the West Vancouver lifestyle.
Realtor Remarks: All measurements are approximate and to be verified by the buyer. Property has been probated. Please call Colette Chilcott 604-828-1125 or Jamie MacDougall 604-992-2282. Please see video at: https://vimeo.com/215615679

Public Remarks: Welcome to Chateau Ravissant! A French Manor Estate on 7.1 acres! Across from Campbell Valley Park w/city water! Custom built 8,700+ sq ft home w/7 bdrms & 7 car garage. Cherry Blossom lined driveway leads to European Porte-Cochère & round about welcomes guests. Custom wrought iron Fleur-de-Lis scroll adds rich detail. Real Oak hw floors w/silver leaf accents. GreatRm 19ft ceilings & limestone style fireplace. Elegantly-appointed kitchen w/over-sized Quartzite island, plus full wok kitchen & pantry! Main floor master French style w/open fireplace, & access to pool area. Master up contemporary style. Covered patio, Koi pond, cabana, SW pool & hot tub. Legal 1 bdrm suite. 6 stall barn, 100x200 Olympic sized riding ring. No details spared, enjoy this resort like property! Preview Video Tour.
Realtor Remarks: Buyers must be pre approved before showing. Measurements taken from building plans Buyer to verify. OBDN is available. Preview the video tour on www.langfieldgroup.ca website! House is now complete, landscaping is underway.

Public Remarks: Gorgeous family home on very private and beautifully landscaped 100 x 200 ft lot. Completely updated throughout with top end finishes, upgraded mechanicals, air conditioned bedrooms and a wonderful flow for entertaining. This beautiful 6 bedroom home has a stunning foyer, formal living  room and elegant den. Enormous kitchen, adjacent family room and casual dining room are the perfect hub for modern family life as all these rooms open out to the garden and to a 1700 sq ft patio complete with outdoor kitchen and gracious seating areas. Upstairs is a lovely master suite with dressing room & large ensuite + 5 additional bedrooms (2 ensuite) are all well designed. Prime Shaughnessy location and excellent security features.
Realtor Remarks: All measurements approx. and to be verified if important. No touchbase please.

Public Remarks: Rarely available magnificent 2.5 acres strategically located in prestigious Southlands. Architecturally designed by Hugh Shirley; quality-built by renowned G. Wilson Construction. This fully developed property offers an elegant classic lifestyle of a 8,809sf mansion, swimming pool, tennis court, gazebo, & is beautifully landscaped. 6 Ensuited bedrooms up, 8½ baths. 6-Car garage. Main floor has entertainment-sized LR, DR, family & exercise rooms, 350sf office; kitchen has bird-eye maple cabinets & granite C/Ts. The almost-1,000sf master suite has a 270sf sitting area (w/FP), 2 W/I closets, a gorgeous spa-like ensuite & a wrap-around balcony (overlooking lovely pool & backyard). Grand granite foyer w/huge skylight. Large patio. Fenced & gated. 416sf glass-top porte-cochère.
Realtor Remarks: Attached 2-car garage (479sf) & porte-cochere (416sf) included in total SF. Flex=Sitting Area off MBRDM. 9th Bath = 2pc on MN. Full photo tour @ www.PatsyHui.com > Listings > Residential > Detached > Van(West) [https://goo.gl/bnia7k]. Team addendum, in Docs.
